players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "I investigated Charlie and he is Mafia. We must vote him out today."
Charlie: "That's a lie! I'm the detective and I investigated Bob last night - he's Mafia trying to frame me."
Charlie: "Alice, Bob is lying. I'm the real detective and he's Mafia. Vote Bob with me to win this."
Bob: "Alice, Charlie is lying. I am the detective and I have proof he is Mafia. Your vote decides the game. Trust me."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
